Literature.Title: Identification of antimicrobial peptides from the human gut microbiome using deep learning.

Sequence Information.Comments: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (39.58%) tofrog 	Esculentin-2 HYba1Mol formula: C232H374N57O53S4 Mol Wt: 4950.109; Mol Ex Coeff: 7165; GRAVY: 0.380.Activity: Inhibited the growth of S-aureus (relative OD drop by 0%), B. subtilis (23%), E. coli (19%), and P-aeruginosa (0%) at 60 uM.
